title: Plant Microbiome
description: We discovered microorganisms in the coffee fruit that enhance bioactive compounds and have a powerful effect on plant metabolism & growth regulation.

title: Intellectual Property
description: We developed a process to capture discarded coffee pulp & mucilage as a foundation for our natural biofertilizer.

title: Circular Economies
description: We build circular economies in coffee producing regions to improve nutrient use efficiency, crop yields, farms profitability and producers well-being.
